channel.title: Near Fatality - Safe PVP, Bounty Hunter,All skills work, Staff Wanted Forum&Serv
channel.description:
[center][b][u][size=24pt]Near Fatality[/size][/u][/b][/center]
[B]Forum[/B] [url=http://www.nearfatality.com]www.nearfatality.com[/url] [B]Download link[/B] [url=http://uppit.com/ork0b5mmsylc/Near_Fatality.jar]http://uppit.com/ork0b5mmsylc/Near_Fatality.jar[/url]
Welcome to Near Fatality. We are a new and up coming server that is looking for a truthful and willing player base with lots of staff positions available within the serverforums. We opened on the 24042015 and it currently a 2 man staff team, with 1 developer. We have lots of money to spend on the server to make it how you would like it. We pride our self on letting players make the choices and decisions that change and shape our server. So if you want to be a part of a server were we will take your suggestions and make them a reality then look no further!
[SIZE=3][B][U]Server Features[/U][/B][/SIZE] New Boss's added Everyday! 30+ Boss's Good Economy Pking at Mage Bank, Safe pk, Hybrid zones Bounty Hunter! Real GodSword Stances (Walking, Running, Attacking, Specials) Full Skilling For All Players HighScores Duel Arena Godwars Working 4-Hit Dragon Claws 100% Barrows With Digging Etc. Pest Control Fight Caves More Monster Teleports Added (Dragons, New Slayer Tower, Etc.) EXP-Lock Feature Added Working Weapon Stats Interface Working Items On Death Interface All Working Prayers PKP Points statue that gives random items. (video below) Frost Dragon points system! (1 point per kill) Many more things just cant remember!
[size=12pt][b]Media[/b][/size]

item.title: Near Fatality - Safe PVP, Bounty Hunter,All skills work, Staff Wanted Forum&Serv
item.dc:creator: @trickcodcinema trickcodcinema
item.description:
@trickcodcinema wrote:

Sorry to anyone who had tried to login in overnight, had a small problem that i had no control over. Server is back online. hope to see all there!!

Also to anyone who reads this, i am no the server owner. just an Advertising help. I recently found the source and this server have quite a few similarities. Things will be discussed and sorted out accordingly. We (staff) of this server do not want a bad image because of this and will work towards making it completely unique as we can push updates. Thanks for playing!

Read full topic
item.source: Near Fatality - Safe PVP, Bounty Hunter,All skills work, Staff Wanted Forum&Serv

Welcome to Near Fatality. We are a new and up coming server that is looking for a truthful and willing player base with lots of staff positions available within the serverforums. We opened on the 24042015 and it currently a 2 man staff team, with 1 developer. We have lots of money to spend on the server to make it how you would like it.
